decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings:

289 P00 (OS Plan); 289 P01 (Existing Site Plan); 289 P02 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLANS); 289 P03 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLANS); 289 P04 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR PLANS); 289 P05 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ROOF PLANS); 289 P06 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATIONS); 289 P07 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED REAR ELEVATIONS); 289 P08 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED SECTION CC); 289 P09 REV A (EXISTING AND PROPOSED SECTION DD); Design and Access Statement.
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless otherwise stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey side/rear (wraparound) extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope; installation of two roof lights to front roof slope; alteration to external elevations; alteration to front boundary wall and front of property involving installation of bicycle and refuse storage; alteration to rear of property involving hard and soft landscaping; and replacement of windows on front and rear elevation.
